control.visible: Skin.String(SkinSettings,6) + Skin.String(OpenSetting6a,1) + [[Skin.String(ConfigButton,1) + Skin.String(HomeButton1Value,Shutdown)] | [Skin.String(ConfigButton,2) + Skin.String(HomeButton2Value,Shutdown)] | [Skin.String(ConfigButton,3) + Skin.String(HomeButton3Value,Shutdown)] | [Skin.String(ConfigButton,4) + Skin.String(HomeButton4Value,Shutdown)] | [Skin.String(ConfigButton,5) + Skin.String(HomeButton5Value,Shutdown)] | [Skin.String(ConfigButton,6) + Skin.String(HomeButton6Value,Shutdown)]]
